titles.title: A bill to remove the embargo on Bosnia-Herzegovina.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5690)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 5/12/1994--Introduced. Prohibits the President or any other member of the executive branch from interfering with the transfer of conventional arms appropriate to the self-defense needs of the Government of Bosnia and Herzegovina. Requires the President to terminate the U.S. arms embargo of such government upon receipt from such government of a request for assistance in exercising its right of self-defense under the United Nations Charter.
